A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really liked it\, and almost every negative comment that I have heard about this film would apply to other Star Wars films\, so if you like the other ones (even just 4-7 and Rogue 1)\, then you should like this one. This bashing of this movie seems trendy almost\, and I remember that they did this for Empire as well\, and now it is regarded as the best one.
